data.name: 0000 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: However, even if we go back to question the Computer Society again…

data.name: 0001 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Those guys are pretty wary because of Haruhi, right?

data.name: 0002 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Won't they avoid being upfront with us…?

data.name: 0003 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The possibility isn't zero, don't you agree?

data.name: 0004 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: For the time being, how about we head their way and try?

data.name: 0005 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Of course, Miss Suzumiya wouldn't be pleased if we came back without trying to ask them.

data.name: 0006 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's true… Anyway, we still need to go, even if just to pretend we're doing something.

data.name: 0007 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Heey, Kyon, are there any games or anything?

data.name: 0008 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, why are you here?

data.name: 0009 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When I looked over my shoulder, my little sister was right behind me.

data.name: 0012 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Weren't you supposed to stay with Haruhi?

data.name: 0013 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yeah, but this way seemed more fun, so I came here.

data.name: 0014 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd love to hear just what seemed fun to her about this.

data.name: 0015 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hey Kyon, so are there any games?

data.name: 0016 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: As if I know. Even if there are some, we're not going there to play.

data.name: 0017 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Make sure to do what you're told, so you don't become a nuisance.

data.name: 0018 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Bleh, booooring.

data.name: 0021 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Y-you guys again?! What is it this time?!

data.name: 0022 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well now, there's no need to be so cold, is there?

data.name: 0023 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Did you forget what your brigade chief did to us?

data.name: 0024 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: If there's a single thing about her that's friendly, I'd love to hear about it!

data.name: 0025 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're not wrong. If anyone asked me, I wouldn't have anything nice to say.

data.name: 0027 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Now now, Mr. Club President.

data.name: 0028 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh? Koizumi?

data.name: 0029 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Please entrust this to me.

data.name: 0030 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Club President, neither of us hold any hostility towards you.

data.name: 0031 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Far from it, in fact. I think we should collaborate with each other.

data.name: 0032 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Don't you want to enjoy a better school life, for both of our benefits?

data.name: 0033 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Hm… really? I'm not in a very trusting mood, but…

data.name: 0034 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He really does seem to be a master of persuasion, that Koizumi fellow.

data.name: 0035 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems like the club president is gradually getting into the mood to talk.

data.name: 0036 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Despite the fact that listening to Koizumi's thrilling talks isn't very enjoyable.

data.name: 0037 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Though your research society is cultural, it's rare to have summer camp at school.

data.name: 0038 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Ah, well…

data.name: 0039 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: …I want you to keep this a secret from your brigade chief, but…

data.name: 0040 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's not a problem.

data.name: 0041 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Thanks a lot. If that person caught wind of this, I fear something bad would happen again.

data.name: 0042 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I get that kind of feeling…

data.name: 0043 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Mr. President, that premonition is terrifyingly accurate.

data.name: 0044 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: So then, why would you be camping at school?

data.name: 0045 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Ahh…

data.name: 0046 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: We're making an original game for the cultural festival.

data.name: 0047 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A game you say? That sounds very interesting.

data.name: 0048 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I would definitely like to give it a try when it's finished.

data.name: 0049 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For goodness sake, even for Koizumi that's going above and beyond…

data.name: 0050 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't know how he can line up all that flattery without even batting an eyelid.

data.name: 0051 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In a way, it's admirable.

data.name: 0052 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though of course, I have absolutely no intention to do the same.

data.name: 0055 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I had to keep listening to Koizumi's flattery my ears would start bleeding.

data.name: 0056 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is there nothing for me to pass the time with? …Hm?

data.name: 0059 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Was this also drawn on a computer?

data.name: 0060 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Y-yes. That's right!

data.name: 0061 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hmm, amazing isn't it?

data.name: 0062 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Not at all… Hahaha.

data.name: 0063 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi, what are you doing?

data.name: 0064 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ah, Kyon!

data.name: 0065 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: This poster is amazing! These people said they made it on a computer!

data.name: 0066 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Poster?

data.name: 0067 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: "Value the water!" Is this supposed to raise awareness of water conservation?

data.name: 0068 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: It was a request form the student council. They're pretty good, don't you think?

data.name: 0069 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: "H2O," in other words "water," is written on the poster using CG, but…

data.name: 0070 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Something about it gives a strange impression. What's wrong with it exactly?

data.name: 0071 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah.

data.name: 0072 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: What is it, Kyon?

data.name: 0073 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right here, isn't the "2" from "H2O" missing?

data.name: 0074 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Huh!? …Ahh, you're right!

data.name: 0075 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: It's the same color as the background, so it's impossible to see!

data.name: 0076 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Also, somehow or another the "H" seems too wide.

data.name: 0077 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's not an H…

data.name: 0078 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It looks like "1-1."

data.name: 0079 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: N-now that you mention it…

data.name: 0080 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Oh, it was an H? I thought they wrote "1-10."

data.name: 0082 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Certainly I couldn't say it doesn't look like it. In other words, it does look like it.

data.name: 0083 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This could be useful.

data.name: 0084 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The poster doesn't convey the intended message in its current state, right?

data.name: 0085 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think it'd be best if you took down the poster's you've put up so far.

data.name: 0086 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's summer vacation, so probably not many students have seen it.

data.name: 0087 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you hurry and remake them, I'm sure nobody will notice.

data.name: 0088 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Uhh, maybe… I'll talk to the president about it and we'll consider it…

data.name: 0089 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He's disappointed, but maybe I could use this as a means to trick Haruhi.

data.name: 0090 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hopefully this is enough to convince her.

data.name: 0094 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. It seems like quite an interesting game.

data.name: 0095 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Yes! We're really proud of it.

data.name: 0096 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi's truly mastered the art of conversation.

data.name: 0097 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not long ago, the club president's mouth was firmly shut.

data.name: 0098 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's impressive that he softened him up so much.

data.name: 0099 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: How about I give you guys a special in-development screening…

data.name: 0101 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Prez! Prez!

data.name: 0102 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Hm, what is it?

data.name: 0103 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I think the memory card with our program on it has gone missing!

data.name: 0104 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: What!?

data.name: 0105 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Wasn't it with us in the computer lab when we were running tests?

data.name: 0106 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Yeah, but it seems like I've lost it since then.

data.name: 0107 (366.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: R-right… I'll go search for it in a bit.

data.name: 0108 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He said "in a bit," but it's clear from his expression that he wants to go straight away.

data.name: 0109 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't really get it, but it seems like they've lost something really important.

data.name: 0110 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There probably is anything more to gain by being here.

data.name: 0111 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi, we've just about run out of time. Let's head back.

data.name: 0114 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Time? Yes, it seems so.

data.name: 0115 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You too. Let's go.

data.name: 0116 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: C'mon, I wanted to play moreee.

data.name: 0117 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm telling you to come with us.

data.name: 0118 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Well, see you later~!

data.name: 0120 (366.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: See you!

data.name: 0121 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like my little sister took a liking to the club members before I realized.

data.name: 0122 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief, I'm surrounded by troublesome people.

data.name: 0124 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: And our harvest was fruitless, huh…

data.name: 0125 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: No no, that's not the case.

data.name: 0126 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We were able to obtain some fairly interesting information.

data.name: 0127 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't think so… But if you say so, I'm willing to take your word for it.

data.name: 0128 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Me too me too! It was interesting!

data.name: 0129 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Okay okay. You can just be quiet.

data.name: 0130 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Now that I think about it, they said they lost their memory card.

data.name: 0131 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Was that just made up so they wouldn't have to show us their game?

data.name: 0132 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: No, it seems to be true. You could tell by the look on their faces.

data.name: 0133 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: What's a "memo reecard"?

data.name: 0134 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Here you go again, butting your head into everything…

data.name: 0135 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hey hey, what is it?

data.name: 0136 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's a small and thin object, about this size perhaps.

data.name: 0137 (366.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hmm… Like that thing?

data.name: 0138 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? …Oh!?

data.name: 0139 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why is a memory card lying in the corner of a corridor!?

data.name: 0140 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see…

data.name: 0141 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: He must've accidentally dropped it when putting up the posters in this area.

data.name: 0142 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Should we return it? …Ah, hold on, what are you doing?

data.name: 0143 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This is conjecture based on what their club president said, but…

data.name: 0144 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Whatever the contents of this are, they definitely don't want Haruhi to know about it.

data.name: 0145 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's what the way they were talking implies, at least.

data.name: 0146 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Doesn't it make you wonder what's inside?

data.name: 0147 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Are you suggesting we take it with us?

data.name: 0148 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Only until our summer camp is over. Once we're done with it, we'll return it.

data.name: 0149 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You can't make an omelet without breaking some eggs…right?

data.name: 0150 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Precisely. I believe that's exactly the case.

data.name: 0151 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see… I'll act like I didn't see anything.

data.name: 0152 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You take responsibility for the memory card, Koizumi.

data.name: 0153 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That was always my intention. I'm not planning to get you in trouble.

data.name: 0154 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If you're inclined, how about I leave it with Miss Nagato?

data.name: 0155 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …I'll look after it.

data.name: 0156 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Did Koizumi swindle me into doing this? Now I'm also complicit.

data.name: 0157 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right. In times like this we shouldn't be over- looking something that could distract Haruhi.

data.name: 0158 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't you think?

data.name: 0159 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's brilliant that you understand.

data.name: 0160 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There must be something wrong with me if I understand the way this guy thinks…

data.name: 0161 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I knew Koizumi liked tabletop games, but…

data.name: 0162 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The fact he also likes computer games makes me think he's someone with a lot of hobbies.

data.name: 0163 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm something of an omnivore.

data.name: 0164 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If it seems interesting, I'm prone to get involved in various things.

data.name: 0165 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Isn't that just called being bored?

data.name: 0166 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I mean, you're so easily amused by anything.

data.name: 0167 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Hahaha, that's quite harsh, isn't it?

data.name: 0168 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You're quite multifaceted yourself. You always go along with whatever I suggest.

data.name: 0169 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Am I wrong?

data.name: 0170 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you only look at the end results, I suppose.

data.name: 0171 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But there were a few games in particular that I wanted to focus on above the rest.

data.name: 0172 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then how about we play one of those games again?

data.name: 0173 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, eventually.

data.name: 0174 (366.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Did you say something?

data.name: 0175 (366.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not particularly.

data.name: 0176 (366.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't have any reason to chat with this guy.

data.name: 0177 (366.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Continue asking regardless.

data.name: 0178 (366.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Look away.

data.name: 0179 (366.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Close your eyes.

data.name: 0180 (366.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Agree.

data.name: 0181 (366.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: So, say it out loud.

data.name: 0182 (366.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: So, just think it in your mind.
